T.query: select id,surveyid from questions where required = 't' and questioncode >'4' and questionposition = 0

F.query: select id,surveyid from questions where required = 'f' and questioncode >'4' and questionposition = 0
select id,surveyid from questions where required = 't' and questioncode <'4' and questionposition = 0
select id,surveyid from questions where required = 't' and questioncode >'4' and questionposition = 0 and externalsystemid >'70'
select id,surveyid from questions where required = 't' and externalsystemid >'4' and questionposition = 0
select id,surveyid from questions where required = 't' and questioncode >'4'
select id,surveyid from questions where required = 'f' and questioncode >'4' and questionposition = 1
